column1: # The following lines populate the Comments page in the Geometrixx Media site

column3: No Ottawa date again this year? :(

column1: # The following lines populate the Reviews page in the Geometrixx Media site

column3: If they nail the graphics like they did on the show this game will be a smash hit.

column1: # The following lines populate the Forum page in the Geometrixx Media site

column3: Will Paladin be the hit game of 2014?
column4: I think it will, I but wanted to get a feel for what the rest of the community thinks! Very excited that they're going to make this into a game.
L'idea di questo videogioco e` fenomenale: finalmente si potra` interagire con un robot e si potranno simulare azioni reali!
C'est le jeu que j'attendais depuis tellement longtemps! Bon, ben il sort quand ce tresor?
I heard early this summer. Going to be a good movie for popcorn!
